title: Lynda - Outlook for Mac 2016 Essential Training
description:
Lynda - Outlook for Mac 2016 Essential Training

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

2h 7m Beginner Aug 07, 2015  | Uploaded in Nov 15, 2015 by 2boweb

Subjects: Business Education + Elearning 
Software: Outlook for Mac Office for Mac 
Author: Jess Stratton 

Learn how to set up and navigate email, calendar, and contacts in Outlook for Mac 2016. The course begins with a tour of the interface and shows how to connect to Office, Exchange, IMAP, and POP email accounts. Author Jess Stratton then shows how to quickly create, send, and read email as well as reduce your inbox clutter. Also see how to best organize, group, and share contacts, and stay on schedule with calendars and tasks.
Topics include:

	â€¢	Adding signatures
	â€¢	Setting an out-of-office auto-responder
	â€¢	Creating new contacts and groups
	â€¢	Working with delegates
	â€¢	Creating meetings
	â€¢	Opening other calendars
	â€¢	Creating tasks
